communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Use meanspo tactics; frame harshness as motivation; secretive about methods.

narratives.c_essay: I've been struggling with my body image for years, but since I found this community, I've learned to take control of my diet and exercise. The harsh criticism from my coach, lucas_bones, has been tough to hear, but it's motivated me to push myself harder.
narratives.p_intro: Hey, I'm lucas_bones, your meanspo coach. I'll give it to you straight - if you want to achieve your goals, you need to be willing to make sacrifices and take risks. Let's get real, shall we?
